links.title: Apple Stock, Nvidia Stock Lead 4 Top Stocks Breaking This Key Support Level
links.description: Apple ( AAPL) and Nvidia ( NVDA) led four top stocks pulling back to their 50-day moving averages on Friday. A strong rebound from that key technical level can offer a chance to add shares to your position.
